name: @cash-io/circuits
description: ZK circuits for Cash.io privacy transactions

scripts.setup: npm run compile && npm run powers-of-tau && npm run setup:transfer && npm run setup:deposit && npm run setup:withdraw
scripts.compile: npm run compile:transfer && npm run compile:deposit && npm run compile:withdraw
scripts.powers-of-tau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 16 build/pot16_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot16_0000.ptau build/pot16_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:transfer: snarkjs groth16 setup build/transfer/transfer.r1cs build/pot16_final.ptau build/transfer/transfer_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/transfer/transfer_0000.zkey build/transfer/transfer_final.zkey --name='Cash.io' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/transfer/transfer_final.zkey build/transfer/transfer_vkey.json
scripts.setup:deposit: snarkjs groth16 setup build/deposit/deposit.r1cs build/pot16_final.ptau build/deposit/deposit_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/deposit/deposit_0000.zkey build/deposit/deposit_final.zkey --name='Cash.io' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/deposit/deposit_final.zkey build/deposit/deposit_vkey.json
scripts.setup:withdraw: snarkjs groth16 setup build/withdraw/withdraw.r1cs build/pot16_final.ptau build/withdraw/withdraw_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/withdraw/withdraw_0000.zkey build/withdraw/withdraw_final.zkey --name='Cash.io' -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/withdraw/withdraw_final.zkey build/withdraw/withdraw_vkey.json
scripts.export:verifiers: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/transfer/transfer_final.zkey contracts/TransferVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/deposit/deposit_final.zkey contracts/DepositVerifier.sol && snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/withdraw/withdraw_final.zkey contracts/WithdrawVerifier.sol
